version_description: - We have updated the game in order to improve performance and quality!
- We have updated the game in order to improve performance and quality!

NEW: We added a profile feature. It’ll help you track:
- Your game progress!
- The looks you created in Style Diary & Style Events!
- Your closet!

NEW: We added a profile feature. It’ll help you track:
- Your game progress!
- The looks you created in Style Diary & Style Events!
- Your closet!

Must Try: Our new multiplayer feature lets you compete 1-ON-1 with other players and get instant results!
Liked your opponents’ entries in the multiplayer events? You can now buy them!
NEW: Indonesian language added. This game is now available in 7 languages.

Must Try: Our new multiplayer feature lets you compete 1-ON-1 with other players and get instant results!
Liked your opponents’ entries in the multiplayer events? You can now buy them!
NEW: Indonesian language added. This game is now available in 7 languages.

- 50 FRESH Style Diary events added!
- Show off your signature style & compete in 100 NEW Multiplayer Style Events.
- Over 100 NEW & TRENDY pieces to choose from - Mix & match your way to Style Super-Stardom!
- Pick & glam up with over 80 NEW shoes, bags & jewelry.
- Special surprise appearances by 25 CUTE EXTRAS & FURRY FRIENDS to add that little bit of sunshine to your look!
- ALL NEW Rewards section - get more coins with a single touch!

- 50 FRESH Style Diary events added!
- Show off your signature style & compete in 100 NEW Multiplayer Style Events.
- Over 100 NEW & TRENDY pieces to choose from - Mix & match your way to Style Super-Stardom!
- Pick & glam up with over 80 NEW shoes, bags & jewelry.
- Special surprise appearances by 25 CUTE EXTRAS & FURRY FRIENDS to add that little bit of sunshine to your look!
- ALL NEW Rewards section - get more coins with a single touch!

- Introducing collections by trendsetting brands - DYNAMITE, NAKED ZEBRA & GARAGE!
- Style away with over 80 NEW tops & bottoms. Plus 65 FRESH & TRENDY dresses!
- Over 30 CHIC accessories and shoes to take your look to the next level!
- Featuring a brand new range of ULTRA GLAM swimwear!
- Added languages for our players in Russia & Turkey!
- Pesky locked levels *bug* FIXED!
- Updated controls for in-game music!

We wish you all an amazing 2019!

* BRAND NEW: 12 realistic SKIN TONES & 25 AMAZING LOOKS each for your LIPS & EYES to complete your style from head to toe to pout.
* NEW: Now watch videos to add your favorite items to your wardrobe!
* 2 NEW languages: Ukrainian & Korean: now LIVE!

- 584 NEW PIECES ADDED - including 84 swanky tops, 85 gorgeous dresses, 74 bottoms, 69 pairs of shoes, 72 pieces of jewelry, 73 bags, AND 97 cool accessories! PLUS 12 new props and 18 trending swimsuits to style to your heart's delight!
- Ni-hao! Konichiwa! We are now LIVE in Chinese and Japanese too!

Itsy bitsy fixes to make sure you're playing our best version yet! We hope you enjoy the update!

*Over 550 NEW pieces added - including 92 dresses, 76 tops, 83 bottoms, 80 shoes, 24 swimsuits, 18 props and 200 shoes, accessories and bags!
*Simple but significant enhancements to the dress up and styling experience!
*Now available to play in 8 MORE languages - Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish, Thai, Vietnamese, Traditional Chinese and Arabic!

No flashy fixes, no dramatic additions - just a clean and simple update to improve all the things you like about the dress up and styling experience!

• New Styles for 2020! Update NOW!  
• NEW: Over 750 Items added - More than 100 dresses tops bottoms accessories and jewelry an all-new line of beachwear and over 75 new bags and shoes too!  
• NEW: 5 Languages Added - Now play in Kazakh, Malay, Filipino, Romanian & Polish. 
• Garment alignment bug FIXED!
AND Featuring a much-needed retouch to our roots - Bugs and Crash issues resolved!
• Here's to a fashionable 2020!

It's summertime and the fashion is easy, breezy, lovely!
Here's What's New in this update:
• NEW: 900 trendy & stylish pieces! Upgrade your summer wardrobe with 156 dresses 125 tops 96 bottoms, 357 shoes, bags, jewelry & accessories, 26 swimsuits & bikinis, 24 new looks for your lips & eyes... AND 35 HAIRSTYLES!
• NEW: 50 Style Challenges Added!
Also, bright, smooth and sparkly enhancements to reinvigorate your styling experience - Have a Happy Summer everyone!

A small and delightful update with a few enhancements including:
• NEW: 12 summery Hairstyles!
Don't miss this download to take your everyday styling experience to the next level!

• This update is all about quick tweaks and some tender love & care to our backend system for a faster & smoother experience! Happy styling!

As the first signs of the festive season appear, download and play this month's update to get warm and cosy with us:
- NEW: 455 freshly stocked items - 50 dresses, 72 tops and bottoms, 81 accessories, 46 bags, over 90 unique eyes and lips and 117 BGs - to keep you sultry and stylish this season!
- INTRODUCING: LUXE gift boxes to earn more coins to jazz up your wardrobe!
All this with art updates and experience enhancements to level up your styling game!

As the first signs of the festive season appear, download and play this month's update to get warm and cosy with us:
- NEW: 455 freshly stocked items - 50 dresses, 72 tops and bottoms, 81 accessories, 46 bags, over 90 unique eyes and lips and 117 BGs - to keep you sultry and stylish this season!
- INTRODUCING: LUXE gift boxes to earn more coins to jazz up your wardrobe!
All this with art updates and experience enhancements to level up your styling game!

Wrapping up the year with a delightful update that's sure to fill you with cheer and lots of fashion fun!
- Introducing a NEW MODEL & 4 NEW SKIN TONES!
- NEW: A total of 484 pieces to inspire your Festive style - including 51 dresses, 59 tops, 56 bottoms, 24 shoes, 133 bags, jewellery and accessories, 38 new looks for eyes and lips, and 88 BGs!
- PLUS other little delicate enhancements to enrich your gaming experience! Happy Holidays everyone!

- Don't miss THIS UPDATE to fix a major content and closet bug flagged by our players.
- We sincerely hope this runs smoothly and we can't wait to carry on our fashionable adventure with you all in 2021!
Happy styling!

As we catch the last of the winter chill, cosy up through the season of love with this UPDATE:
NEW: Pick from 8 fabulous HAIR COLORS & customise every hairstyle to complete your unique & stylish looks!
NEW: 200 freshly curated pieces added - 9 bags, 34 tops & bottoms, 37 dress, 43 pairs of shoes & jewellery, 5 hairstyles, 28 eyes & lips to style your perfect outfit!
NEW: Thai Language added!
All this with some new features in our Coin Store! We hope this makes you fall in LOVE with fashion all over again!

A quick lil' UPDATE to fix the gameplay & app update glitch faced by some of our long-time players in our previous version:
Levels Select in Style Diary & Style Challenge Modes FIXED!
A Big THANK YOU to all our fashionable stylists & patrons for your help! We hope you love this version as much as we love y'all!

- BUG FIXES: Issues reported wrt Hairstyles, Closet & coins & Zoom functionality FIXED!
- NEW: 336 Summery items - 38 dresses, 41 tops, 34 bottoms, 99 bags & accessories, 41 pieces of jewelry & 30 fabulous eye & lips makeup looks - for both our models to amp up our Summer Style!
- NEW: Link up with us on INSTAGRAM & join our community of stylish trendsetters & fashion-lovers!
